mapper.sql: user_group_id, up_user_group_id, user_group_name, user_group_desc, create_time, create_user_id
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM t_cfg_user u left JOIN t_fss_user a on u.user_id=a.user_id LEFT JOIN t_fss_usergroup b ON a.fss_usergroup_id = b.user_group_id WHERE 1=1
and a.user_id = #{UserID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
limit 1

SELECT
from t_fss_usergroup a where 1=1
and a.up_user_group_id = #{UpUserGroupID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
order by a.user_group_name,a.update_time asc
mapper.insert:
insert into t_fss_usergroup
user_group_id,
up_user_group_id,
user_group_name,
user_group_desc,
create_time,
create_user_id,
#{UserGroupID,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{UpUserGroupID,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{UserGroupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{UserGroupDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{CreateTime,jdbcType=DATE},
#{CreateUserID,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update t_fss_usergroup
up_user_group_id = #{UpUserGroupID,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_group_name = #{UserGroupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_group_desc = #{UserGroupDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{CreateTime,jdbcType=DATE},
create_user_id = #{CreateUserID,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where user_group_id = #{UserGroupID,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_fss_usergroup set up_user_group_id = #{UpUserGroupID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_group_name = #{UserGroupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_group_desc = #{UserGroupDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{CreateTime,jdbcType=DATE}, create_user_id = #{CreateUserID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where user_group_id = #{UserGroupID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
